#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	long long int i,x;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int n,pro;
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		pro=1;
		for(i=0;i<n;++i)
		{
		scanf("%lld",&x);
	    x%=1000000007;
	    pro*=x;
	    pro%=1000000007;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",pro);
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
